St. George and the Dragon



From the Danish National Museum. "The group was carved ca. 1520 by Hans Brüggemann. Husum Church, Slesvig."
Taken Sunday, June 17, 2018, 04:33:21AM. Original image size: 2468x3702, 1.7Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/40s@ F6.3, ISO 1600, 17-40mm f/4L, 28mm (44mm equiv)
PS CS5 3600:15, Fill20 B15, Profile, Crop, USM 20:5
